title.sub_title: The maximum duration of data displayed on the Temperature Monitoring Dashboard is 1 month.

cold_storages_info.total: Number of cold storages registered in the SMILE application. This number does not reflect passive cold storages (cold box and vaccine carrier).
cold_storages_info.relation_to_rtmd: Number of active cold storages (Refrigerator, Refrigerator & Freezer, Refrigerator/Freezer, Freezer, dan Freezer Room) registered in the SMILE application and connected to Remote Temperature Monitoring Devices (RTMD) according to settings updated by users.

rtmds_info.total: Number of RTMDs registered in the SMILE application.
rtmds_info.online: Number of RTMDs with temperature records successfully sent to the SMILE application.

rtmd_status.title: RTMD Status
rtmd_status.info: Status of RTMDs that classified into online/offline based on the existence of temperature records sent to the SMILE application within the period selected. If a RTMD does not have any temperature record within that period, then the status is considered as offline.

offline_duration.title: Average Daily Offline Duration
offline_duration.info: Average offline duration (without temperature records) from online RTMD.

temperature_excursion.title: Temperature Excursion
temperature_excursion.info:
An episode in which the temperature deviates from the specified recommended ranges of temperature to store vaccines, which divided into 2°C to 8°C and -25°C to -15°C. A temperature excursion is defined based on records from temperature readings sent by RTMDs compared to the ideal/recommended temperature for each type of storages.

An excursion is categorized into:
Temperature above the range: when the temperature is above 8°C OR above -15°C for freezing temperature. For freezing temperature, it further classified into:
• Above -15°C to -0.5°C, and
• Above -0.5°C.
Temperature below the range: when the temperature is below 2°C OR below -15°C. For temperature ranges 2°C to 8°C, it further classified into:
• -0.5°C to below 2°C, and
• Below -0.5°C

filter.hint: Click on any of the chart color categories below to view the detailed data.

excursion_episodes.title: Number of Excursion Episodes
excursion_episodes.subtitle: By Category of Excursion and Week Year
excursion_episodes.info: Number of episodes or frequency of temperature excursion by category and week year period.

cold_storages_excursion.title: Number of Cold Storages Experienced Temperature Excursion
cold_storages_excursion.subtitle: By Category of Excursion and Week Year
cold_storages_excursion.info: Quantities of cold storages that experienced temperature excursion by category and week year period.

excursion_by_type.title: Number of Episodes of Temperature Excursion
excursion_by_type.subtitle: By Cold Storage Types
excursion_by_type.info: Number of episodes or frequency of temperature excursion for each category of excursion by cold storage types.

entities_excursion.title: Number of Entities
entities_excursion.subtitle: With the Cold Storages Experienced Temperature Excursion
entities_excursion.info: Number of entities in which the cold storages experienced temperature excursion specified for each category of temperature excursion.

readings_distribution.title: Distribution of Temperature Readings Status
readings_distribution.subtitle: By Province
readings_distribution.info: Distribution of average duration of temperature readings status sent by RTMD. From the records of temperature readings, the status is grouped into: normal and excursion (specific for each category of temperature excursion for each recommended temperature ranges). Offline status is duration when RTMD have no records of temperature readings.
